Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Neilian Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Neilian Drive and Riverdell Way.
Room.LongDescription: Riverdell Way runs north and south through the intersection with Neilian Drive, which runs east and west. There is a large forest on both sides of the western part of the road. The thick brush and trees make it hard to see what's inside, if indeed there is something inside.
